steps.name: $("By.xpath: //div[@data-card-id]//a[@href and not(@data-testid='card-facade-external-link')][0]") drag and drop(target: {By.xpath: //div[starts-with(@data-testid, 'column') and not(contains(@data-testid, 'title'))][3]/div}, method: JS)
$("By.xpath: //div[starts-with(@data-testid, 'column') and not(contains(@data-testid, 'title'))][3]/div/by text: Customer-focused systemic array") should have(visible)
